## FinalFieldType type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type FinalFieldType<Def extends FieldDefinition> = Def['isRef'] extends true ? RefType<{
    type: 'ref';
    array: Def['isArray'];
    arrayRequired: Def['isRequired'];
    valueRequired: Def['isRequired'];
    link: Def['typeName'];
    authorization: [];
}> : Arrayatize<Requiredtize<PrimitiveType<Def['typeName']>, Def>, Def>;
```
